channel.title: King of The Blue Hills
channel.description: Road Cycling, Mountain Biking and Cyclocross in the Greater Boston Area

item.title: BHCC Sets Record for Number of Bathroom Stops
item.description: This weekend while returning from the Rasputitsa Spring Classic, the members of the Blue Hills Cycling Club set a Record for the number of times they had to stop and pee. “It started with a few post race beers at the Publick House” racer Scott Taylor explained - “Before you know it we stopped at two Dunkin Donuts, a Cumberland Farms, The New Hampshire State Liquor Store and one final moment of relief at Andy’s House”, Andy could not be reached for comment.

item.title: Boston Rebellion Us Cup
item.description:
Come out Check out the Boston Rebellion ProXCT Mountain Bike Race at Adams Farm this Weekend!.

Register Here. There is an event for Everyone. UCI Pro Men and Women MTB Racing is on Saturday as well as a 12K and 6K Trail Race (Running Race). Amateur MTB Racing and STXC will be on Sunday.
